text: @ElieNYC Just an FYI - trumps political poodles installed at the cdc want everyone to like Trump’s lower numbers “I like them lower” ... or something to that effect. When reporting on current death tolls , don’t use his reported numbers, use the excess /1         https://t.co/o6zUfCjTBE
